alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 6:50PM MDT until March 22 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds increasing to 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph by Wednesday afternoon. * WHERE...South Central Mountains and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 11 AM MDT Wednesday. For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM to 7 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
